Description.Text: The resort hotel is modern complex that offers elegant and well appointed guestrooms and suites. There are also a number of dining options, which include a multi cuisine restaurant that offers local, India, and Oriental dishes. The hotel also offers guests with a variety of recreational facilities, such as a lovely outdoor pool, excellent spa services, and a state of the art gym. There are also them nights every evening, with live music and performers.

The Baywatch Resort Hotel is situated along the Colva Beach coastline on the white sands of the Sernabatim Beach. Margao, the commercial capital of Goa is just 3 miles away. The hotel has a total of 80 comfortable, spacious guestrooms, a state of the art gym, sauna, steam room, massage and spa, with a varied selection of treatments and therapies available.
